response.original_title: 愛しい人妻（ひと） ひと夏のたわむれ
response.overview: Yukari, a breathtakingly beautiful wife, has fled her home with her son, Ryo, leaving her husband and her old life behind. One steamy afternoon, fate intervenes when she stumbles upon Yoshio—a rugged stranger she met by chance through a late‑night teleclub. Feeling both exhilarated and desperately alone, she lets herself be drawn into his world, slipping into his small apartment as an uninvited guest. Soon, guilt—and the thrill of the forbidden—weighs on Yukari’s heart. Driven by a fierce, instinctual yearning, she decides to seize the moment and seduce her host with her flaming body.  Yukari presses herself against Yoshio, with trembling fingers, she finds the bulge of his desire and buries her face there, drinking in the heat between them. Around them, the world blurs into a haze of wet skin and whispered names as they give in to a carnal hunger—soft cries turned ravenous gasps—as the long, hot night wraps them in its throbbing, breathless embrace.
response.title: My Beloved Wife: A Summer Fling
